lead_paragraph: The suspects, a man and a woman, blew themselves up on the outskirts of Dhaka, the capital. Officials said it was the first time a female militant committed suicide in that manner.

headline.print_headline: A Police Raid in Bangladesh Leads to 2 Suicide Explosions
headline.main: 2 Suspected Militants Detonate Suicide Bombs During a Police Raid in Bangladesh

snippet: The suspects, a man and a woman, blew themselves up on the outskirts of Dhaka, the capital. Officials said it was the first time a female militant committed suicide in that manner....
